idea:
Accept it or not, Indians have a great fond for sweets, whether it is a heavy meal or light snacks and in this variety, Sweets and confectionery foods have been winning the hearts of Indians across all age groups. From the quick bite to a special occasion, it has been playing a major role in the life of the Indians. Anutham Mithaas is an emerging sweet shop franchisee company with quality products and provide Sweets that Invigorate the Taste Buds

and are provided with a vast variety of yummy flavours and distinctive taste equations to get customer’s palate a great pleasure, Anutham Mithaas’s sweet delicacies will do wonders and tender an exhaustive array of options to choose from. Ranging from different kinds of sweets and many more delights along with savouries by offering quite a different eatery experience. Anutham promises purity, variety and quality and adopts them as the core values with a strong hold over the traditional taste secrets and advanced manufacturing technology. Anutham Mithaas Private Limited, incorporated in March 2022, aims to create an ecosystem for small regional players to bring them on a wide platform and build franchise based business for hyper local sweet shops owners and to provide franchises in Mumbai and later in Maharashtra and all across India.
name: ANUTHAM MITHAAS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Accorn Solutions Techindia Private Limited is a recruiting agency that serves a wide range of clients in a number of sectors across India. We source for a wide range of sectors, but we specialise in IT due to our staff's corporate and IT backgrounds.At Accorn Solutions Techindia, we devote our time and energy to solving the demand for high-quality resources among the industry's most reputable information technology businesses. In addition to serving as one of the best players among all of the specialist IT recruitment agencies in India, we have also gained the prestigious reputation of being the only player among the best IT recruitment agencies internationally. This has allowed us to serve as one of the best players in both categories. We are continually working on producing innovative recruiting and staffing solutions that are the best in class for the information technology and telecommunications industries all around the world.
name: ACCORN SOLUTIONS TECHINDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Cloy exists to help Companies understand Gen-Z, because we are Gen-Z. Companies want and need to engage Generation Z, and to stay relevant, must do so authentically. We exist so that those companies donʼt just talk about us, they talk to us.


We are a social enterprise specializing in Publishing, Social Media, Music, Research, Consulting & Production. We are Generation Z - from our founder to our writers, to our creatives, to our readers. Our content is shaped by Youth Culture and powered by Social Change. The Cloy exists to help Companies understand Gen-Z because we are Gen-Z. The Cloy has kept growing since as people continue to wake up to the power of young people.
name: The Cloy
